channel.title: How would i make a player drop 50k or so when he/she is killed?
channel.description:
Someone help? I've used google... used the search bar... looked on YouTube... And even tried things myself. What more can i do?
I need help making a player drop 50k/100k when killed. The amount doesn't really matter... It doesn't matter if he drops it when killed by a monster, either. I just want him to drop 50k when he's either pked or just anytime he/she's killed.
If someone could help.. Thank you.

item.title: How would i make a player drop 50k or so when he/she is killed?

what base do you have?

item.title: How would i make a player drop 50k or so when he/she is killed?
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

Adam:

Find your drop method and add the drop of 50 coins. Most drop methods already contain a statement that drops bones on default. Just follow the format of that statement.

I’m assuming i should search Client.Java, but what do i search? I’ll try DeathMethod… Is that what i should search?

Read full topic
